website_summaries.verdict: Based off the Lakai favorite Griffin, the Porter is a freshly polished silhouette. It rides with a cleaner, slimmer, and more seamless upper construction than other Lakai shoes. Aiming to be more minimalistic, the Porter sports an embroidered Flare logo on its sidewalls and settles atop a white midsole.With its candid, plain styling, the Porter is perfect for those silent skaters who want their tricks to do all the talking. It has a trustworthy level of comfort, board feel, and grip. Lastly, the Lakai Porter sits friendly at $58.
pros: The Lakai Porter is very budget-friendly
Nearly all the reviewers dig its simple, clean, and fresh-looking design
Its level of comfort proves superb, according to most testers
A few skaters commend the Porter’s flexibility, board feel and grip, which make it suitable for technical ledge skateboarding
One reviewer like that the laces were set up pretty high and the seams set far back as that kept them away from the flick and rip-and-wear areas
Quite a few Lakai first-timers feel happy to have started with the Porter
The Porter breaks in nicely, a user remarks
It has a cushy heel area, a reviewer notes
Some buyers regard the Porter as a fantastic showcase from Lakai
cons: A fair number of customers agree that the Porter runs small and suggest going up half a size
The metal eyelets began pulling out after a few skate sessions, base on a review
Some wearers report that the canvas upper is difficult to keep clean as it also gets discolored when wet
A few skaters mention the Porter needs more arch support
The collar and tongue are thinly padded, a reviewer points out

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looked really good, but it didn't work with my wide foot and high arches. I tried going a size up, but that wasn't enough to compensate. I anticipate that it would be quite comfortable with someone that has normal feel, or even narrow and/or flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size bigger and it worked out. Normally wear 10.5 but i did 11 and fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: randy henderson

customer_reviews.title: The return and reorder was very easy. Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a half size smaller 8.5 base on a JPC brand that I bought last year but I had to return and reorder my normal size 9. The return and reorder was very easy. Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: IZZY

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Greats shoes. Comforable and great looking. I have them in white, and it is hard to keep them clean. If not for that, I’d wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weilen

customer_reviews.title: Use your Adidas size as a guideline
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, seem quality. Fits like an Adidas shoe--i'm 9.5 adidas (slightly wider than nike) and these fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Sam Konings

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and they look great
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money and they look great. They feel and look like $80 skate shoes you’d buy at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality canvas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, material and quality looks great. Tied a knot by the shoelace holes and tucked laces underneath sole.
customer_reviews.author: Fleomarket

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfy but I suggest a 9 1/2 if ur a 9 in shoes
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfy but I suggest a 9 1/2 if ur a 9 in shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Slightly tight at first, Will stretch out with more wear
customer_reviews.author: Leo Menezes

customer_reviews.title: a gift for me
customer_reviews.text: in the break in time ,well tell if they are ok in long walks.
customer_reviews.author: tom

product_meta.title: Lakai Porter, Men’s Porter
feature_bullets: It's always a good time to skate with the clean, minimal design of the Lakai® Porter shoe!
Uppers of suede, canvas, or textile materials (Please check colorway for specific material).

Embroidered Flare logo detailing. Padded footbed for added support. Vulcanized outsole for optimum flex and boardfeel. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13.1 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
